message: Let's start with a fair split. Take it or leave it!
Meet me halfway. No more, no less!
Too close to equal, I'd like a bit more!
You're getting close to meeting me halfway, now it's my turn to make a move!
Getting closer to my target. Be reasonable!
Still not enough, I'm not giving up yet!
I'm willing to budge a bit, but don't think I'm going to give up my lead!
Fine, you win this round. But I'm still the champion of negotiation!
